titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TRAINING ACTIVITY ACTUAL COMPLETION DATE (GP TRAINING) - Description

div.p: TRAINING ACTIVITY ACTUAL COMPLETION DATE (GP TRAINING) is the same as attribute TRAINING ACTIVITY ACTUAL COMPLETION DATE.

TRAINING ACTIVITY ACTUAL COMPLETION DATE (GP TRAINING) is the actual date on which an EMPLOYEE successfully completed their General Practitioner training to attain QUALIFICATION TYPE National Code 'Certificate of Completion of Training (CCT) - General Practitioner Training'.
